name: Korea SNS
author: Jongmyoung Kim

sections.description:
Korea SNS

  • 한국형 소셜 플러그인 버튼을 포스트나 페이지에 삽입하세요.
  • 한국에서 주로 사용되는 소셜 네트워크 공유 기능으로 구성되어 활용도가 높습니다.
  • 공유 가능한 소셜 네트워크 : 페이스북, 트위터, 텔레그램, 카카오톡, 네이버 (라인, 밴드, 카페)
  • 플러그인 홈페이지 : http://icansoft.com/product/korea-sns
  • Korea SNS 사용자 그룹 (페이스북) : http://facebook.com/groups/koreasns

Korea SNS Pro 업그레이드

  • 공유 버튼 순서를 제어할 수 있는 Pro 버전으로 업그레이드 하세요.
  • 자세히 알아보기 : http://icansoft.com/product/korea-sns-pro

Korea SNS

  • You can Insert share buttons for korean in contents post or page.
  • The post can be inserted into the button information, information before, after, or during you.
  • You can set the plug-in settings page before, is inserted after the selection.
  • If you enter a short code in the article is my content is inserted as follows: [korea_sns_button]
  • Share Buttons – facebook, twitter, telegram, kakaotalk, naver line, naver band.
  • More Information : http://icansoft.com/product/korea-sns/
  • Support Forum : http://facebook.com/groups/koreasns

Upgrade to Korea SNS Pro

  • Please upgrade to the Pro version that allows you to control the Share button sequence.
  • More Information : http://icansoft.com/product/korea-sns-pro/

Support

지원 포럼

  • Korea SNS 사용자 그룹(페이스북)이 마련되어 있습니다. 추가되었으면 하는 기능이 있거나 사용에 문제가 있다면 알려주세요.
  • http://facebook.com/groups/koreasns

Korea SNS Pro 업그레이드

  • 공유 버튼 순서를 제어할 수 있는 Pro 버전으로 업그레이드 하세요.
  • 자세히 알아보기 : http://icansoft.com/product/korea-sns-pro/

Support Forum

  • http://facebook.com/groups/koreasns

Upgrade to Korea SNS Pro

  • Please upgrade to the Pro version that allows you to control the Share button sequence.
  • More Information : http://icansoft.com/product/korea-sns-pro/
sections.installation:
설치하기

  • “워드프레스 데쉬보드 -> 플러그인 메뉴 -> 플러그인 추가”로 들어갑니다.
  • “korea sns”로 검색하여 “Korea SNS”를 설치합니다.
  • 플러그인 메뉴에서 korea SNS “활성화” 버튼을 클릭 합니다.
  • 설정 화면에 Kakao API Key를 입력합니다.
  • ! 본 페이지에서 직접 다운로드 받을 수도 있습니다. 이 경우, FTP를 통해 /wp-content/plugins/ 디렉토리에 업로드하세요.

Installation

  • Find Korea SNS plugin and install plugin in wordpress dashboard.
  • Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  • Select position option in Dashboard > Setting > Korea SNS
  • Insert Kakaotalk API Key
  • ! You can download from this page. In this case, upload the korea_sns directory into the /wp-content/plugins/ directory by FTP.
sections.changelog:
1.7

  • Enable rounded style button.
  • Remove kakaostory button.
  • Add button that copy URL to clipboard.

1.6.5

  • CSRF Protection.

1.6.4

  • Change twitter icon to x.

1.6.3

  • Optimize code.

1.6.2

  • Optimize code.

1.6.2

  • Enable telegram in PC.

1.6.1

  • Support multilingual – English, Korean
  • Fix script error when uninstall

1.6.0

  • Optimize setting page.
  • Add mono icon.

1.5.9

  • Enable Naver Cafe.

1.5.8

  • Remove Google+ and Add Telegram button.

1.5.7

  • Remove Kakaotalk button, beause not work.

1.5.6

  • Enable Naverband in desktop PC.

1.5.5

  • Remove script warning message.

1.5.4

  • Fixed an error in the mobile Google link.

1.5.3

  • Kakao API initialize safty. Show alert message ‘Only Mobile’ when click mobile-specific buttons in PC.

1.5.2

  • Some theme and solved the conflict between the function name.

1.5.1

  • In smartphones have improved to the app, not a web when Kakaostory button click. Was easier login step is omitted.

1.5

  • Naver blog share button has been added.

1.4.10

  • Two or more shortcode exposure KakaoTalk has only one button to correct the problem that operation.

1.4.9

  • Fixed a problem this option is not kept hidden mobile.

1.4.8

  • Fixed an error in v1.4.7 of KakaoTalk button.

1.4.7

  • Kakaostory preview creation through share this became possible when a pop-up window with comments.

1.4.6

  • If the image is too small for KakaoTalk message (horizontally or vertically, or if less than 80 pixels) Fixed an error that occurred.
  • The image rate of KakaoTalk message Fixed an issue that is not reflected correctly.

1.4.5

  • The ability to change the icon title of KakaoTalk message has been added.
  • When you send a message KakaoTalk has been enhanced to maintain the ratio of the thumbnail images.

1.4.4

  • Added a center alignment option.

1.4.3

  • If you set the position in both Fixed an issue where the bottom Kakaotalk button does not work.
  • If you include the quotes in the article title tags and Fixed an error that occurred.

1.4.2

  • Double-byte characters, solves problems when sharing a link to a URL that includes Twitter, Kakaostory and Naver Band.

1.4.1

  • Kakaotalk share image broken fixed a issue.
  • Button on some themes that we solve the problem is listed in 2 rows.

1.4

  • Instead, we used a div img tag. (In order to minimize the effects of theme style)
  • Kakaostory Fixed an issue when you go to the store to share.
  • Kakaostory API upgraded to work on your PC. Since it does not modify the shares immediately before the commencement posts as traditional methods.

1.3.2

  • Button to solve the problem that is output to the vertical (second update)

1.3.1

  • Button to solve the problem that is output to the vertical

1.3

  • Add Naver Line.
  • Improved the button design.
  • Has been modified to use the images included in the plug-in for all the Share button.
  • The article lists a summary article has been modified only the bottom button is visible.

1.2

  • Upgrade Kakaotalk API

1.1.1

  • Add mobile-hide option buttons on the desktop

1.1

  • When the title may contain quotes errors when attempting resolve kakaotalk Share. Troubleshooting do not share the characteristics that image post on KakaoStory problem

short_description: Puts Korea social share buttons in post and page. support kakaotalk, naver (line, band, cafe), facebook, twitter, telegram
